question: Which of the following statements are true regarding Egress-only IGWs?

answers.A: They only work with IPv6; they don't work with IPv4 addresses
answers.B: It ensures that the EC2 instances are accessible from the internet
answers.C: For enabling egress-only internet traffic, you need to create an egress-only IGW in VPC and add a route to the route table pointing all IPv6 traffic to (::/0) to the egress-only IGW
answers.D: It ensures that EC2 instances can communicate with the internet
